title: 'Appreciate you, Coach': Lee Corso's impact felt far beyond 'GameDay' audience
content: The larger-than-life face of college football has touched so many, from fans and players to colleagues and friends.

title: Ohtani takes big leap, earns win in 5-inning gem
content: Dodgers' two-way star Shohei Ohtani completed five innings for the first time this season, holding the Reds to one run to earn his first win of the season.

title: Staley met with Knicks, would've taken HC job
content: Had the Knicks offered their head coaching job to South Carolina women's coach Dawn Staley, who interviewed for the position, she said she would have taken it.

title: Townsend-Ostapenko ends in heated net exchange
content: US Open opponents Taylor Townsend and Jelena Ostapenko got into a face-to-face argument on the Court 11 sideline right after Townsend won their second-round match 7-5, 6-1 on Wednesday.

title: Suns sued by minority owners over records access
content: Suns minority owners Andy Kohlberg and Scott Selding have filed a lawsuit against the team, alleging that owner Mat Ishbia has refused access to internal records.

title: Messi's magic fires Miami into Leagues Cup final
content: Inter Miami advanced to the Leagues Cup final with a 3-1 victory over Orlando City on Wednesday night, thanks to two goals from a returning Lionel Messi.

title: McLean spins gem, makes history in Mets' sweep
content: Nolan McLean became the first New York Mets pitcher to win his first three major league starts, tossing eight magnificent innings in a 6-0 victory over the Philadelphia Phillies that completed a three-game sweep.

title: Three Rangers with 5 RBIs in 20-3 rout of Angels
content: Adolis Garcia, Joc Pederson and Kyle Higashioka each hit three-run homers and had five RBIs as the Rangers blew out the Angels 20-3.

title: ‚úç Schefter's fantasy football cheat sheet
content: No one is more plugged in to the latest buzz around the NFL than Adam Schefter. We asked him to share his favorite values in fantasy drafts with you.

title: We picked X factors for all 32 teams: Who could be a difference-maker this season?
content: What do Ricky Pearsall, Riley Moss, Breece Hall and Rashan Gary have in common? The success of their teams could depend on them.

title: Inside the rise of the home run robbery: Why baseball's most thrilling play is happening more than ever
content: Nothing brings a crowd to its feet like a homer being taken away. Here's what's powering the rise in outfielder thievery.

title: MLB Power Rankings: Where every team stands as final month approaches
content: As we enter September, every team has something it's focusing on in the final stretch -- ranging from playoff prep to building for next season.

title: GameDay Kickoff: Expectations for Jeremiah Smith, LSU-Clemson and more ahead of Week 1
content: Ahead of Week 1, here's what to expect from Jeremiah Smith and Arch Manning, freshmen to watch and notable offseason quotes.

title: The game is on the line: Which WNBA player gets the last shot?
content: Some thrive in high-pressure situations. Some are the best players, period. Who is that go-to for every team?

title: 25 under 25: Clark, then who? Ranking the best young players
content: Which players have the most future potential? Caitlin Clark, Paige Bueckers and Angel Reese make our list.

title: Mike Clay's Playbook, Part 3: How to manage your team post-draft
content: The draft is just the beginning of the fun. Mike Clay gives you a guide to being a savvy, championship-winning manager.

title: 'He wasn't trying to be anybody else': How Aaron Rodgers won over his Steelers teammates
content: Aaron Rodgers made up for lost offseason time by getting to know his newest teammates. Will it matter?

title: Inside Caleb Williams' 'unapologetic' approach to Year 2 as Bears QB
content: Williams has his flair back as he enters the season with high expectations under new coach Ben Johnson.

title: The best NHL draft pick ever, at every slot from No. 1 to 224
content: Who's the best No. 1 pick? What about No. 27? We analyzed every draft from 1967 to 2025 to find the answers.

title: A reminder of how the draw and new format works
content: We're taking you on a guided tour of the new Champions League to show you exactly how the format works.

title: The beginning of the end for Amorim? Man United's shocking loss to fourth-tier Grimsby raises the possibility
content: Ruben Amorim and Manchester United arrived in Grimsby keen to start winning again. Instead, they made history with their latest low point.

title: Instant meme! Man United boss Amorim's tactics board vs. Grimsby goes viral
content: As United lurched into yet another catastrophe, an image of Amorim summed up the club's current situation.

title: Who has a shot at the championship? Predictions for 2025-26 NBA conference and Finals winners
content: Our final Summer Forecast panel reveals its championship predictions for the East and West conferences and the 2026 NBA Finals.

title: The five stories that explain why Arch Manning was built for this moment
content: How did the Texas quarterback learn to handle the pressure he's facing as the most famous college football player in the country?

title: Why Rashee Rice accepted his six-game suspension now, and how Chiefs will have to cope
content: With the timing and length of Rice's suspension now known, Andy Reid and the offense can plan their season accordingly.

title: The biggest roster moves from all 32 NFL teams: How did each team get to 53 players?
content: With the 2025 season a week away, NFL teams were required to finalize their 53-man rosters. We rounded up every team's cuts here.

title: Finding the overs: Why the prop lines offer value on Evans, Hunter, Harrison and more
content: Another 1,000-yard season for Mike Evans? Travis Kelce to surprise? Rookies to watch? Eric Karabell offers the lines on overs that are appealing.

title: College football betting: Breaking down the Heisman and national champion odds, top bets
content: Pamela Maldonado tracks the odds for the Heisman Trophy and the national champion and her best value bets.

title: A contract, designer wardrobe and UFC win: Inside Baisangur Susurkaev's best week
content: Baisangur Susurkaev entered the week of Aug. 12 unknown and ended it Dana White's "favorite fighter."

title: Way-too-early UFC at the White House fight card
content: Let's take an early look at a UFC event at the White House in 2026 that Dana White says is "going to happen."

title: Transfer rumors, news: PSG, Liverpool line up move for Bayern's Olise
content: Bayern Munich winger Michael Olise is attracting attention from PSG and Liverpool. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: From market rate to intermediaries, seven truths about the transfer market
content: The big clubs have the spending power and influence, but there are plenty of ways teams like Genoa can keep pace.

title: NWSL transfer grades: Amid world-record fee and USWNT hopefuls, which moves were best?
content: A new world-record deal in women's soccer and some potential USWNT stars are among the NWSL's big moves of the transfer window. Let's grade them!

title: 'I was just lightheaded': Ravens showcase reactions of undrafted rookies who made team's roster
content: Three players produced a range of reactions when being informed of the good news that they made the Baltimore Ravens 53-man roster.

title: 'There is struggle but no quarrel': RSS chief on ties with BJP-led Centre
content: RSS chief Mohan Bhagwat addressed the media on the third day of the organisation's centenary event, emphasizing the importance of values and tradition in education alongside technology. He advocated for Sanskrit study to understand India's knowledge and culture, while clarifying the RSS's coordination with the BJP government, acknowledging potential struggles but denying any quarrel.

title: Big twist in 'dowry murder': Nikki told docs she suffered burns in cylinder blast
content: The death of Nikki Bhati in Noida is under intense scrutiny as conflicting accounts emerge. While Nikki told doctors she suffered burns in a gas cylinder blast, her sister alleges she was set on fire by her husband due to dowry harassment.

title: US tariff impact: Centre assures no 'long-term loss'; export promotion in focus
content: The Commerce Ministry is accelerating the Export Promotion Mission to aid exporters. It acknowledges the impact of 50% US tariffs on sectors like textiles and chemicals. Officials believe this impact will be short-term. They emphasize creating resilient supply chains and diversifying exports. The industry is concerned about slowing orders and liquidity.

title: How the Trump-Modi friendship came undone in five episodes
content: The relationship between US President Trump and Prime Minister Narendra Modi, once hailed as a bromance, encountered turbulence during Trump's presidency. Key disagreements arose from Trump's offer to mediate in Kashmir, a move rejected by India, and a canceled meeting during Modi's US visit in 2024.

title: PM Modi 'abused': BJP says 'boundaries crossed'; Cong leader apologises
content: The Bharatiya Janata Party has accused Rahul Gandhi's 'Voter Adhikar Yatra' in Bihar of using abusive language against Prime Minister Narendra Modi. A viral video allegedly shows individuals using a slur against PM Modi during the Yatra in Darbhanga district.

title: Peter Theil on why stock of Nvidia may not be a 'good buy' now
content: Nvidia's impressive second-quarter revenue, a 56% year-over-year surge, surpassed Wall Street's expectations, yet shares dipped, signaling investor apprehension. Peter Thiel lauded Nvidia's AI chip dominance at the All-in Summit, highlighting their hardware layer monopoly. However, he cautioned against chasing the hype, suggesting the stock might not be a worthwhile investment now, drawing parallels to the dot-com bubble era.

title: 3 Pak terrorists in Bihar: Cops announce Rs 50k reward; share passport details
content: Intelligence agencies alerted Bihar authorities about three Pakistani terrorists entering through Nepal. Vehicle checks are underway in border areas. Police stations are on high alert. A reward of Rs 50,000 is offered for information. The terrorists, identified as Hasnain, Adil, and Usman, arrived in Kathmandu in August. They are suspected to have entered Bihar through Araria district.

title: Watch: Sachin Tendulkar and family offer prayers at Lalbaugcha Raja
content: Sachin Tendulkar and his family, including his recently engaged son Arjun, visited Lalbaugcha Raja in Mumbai to seek blessings during Ganesh Chaturthi. The family's traditional attire and public appearance drew significant media attention. This visit follows Arjun's engagement to Saaniya Chandhok, confirmed by Sachin himself, marking a new chapter for the young Tendulkar.

title: ‚ÄòTrump a peacemaker‚Äô: Secret letter from Xi helps revive India-China ties
content: US President Trump's tariff war is inadvertently pushing India and China closer, focusing on strengthening trade ties after strained relations. In March, China initiated diplomatic communications, with President Xi Jinping expressing concerns about US deals.

title: Musk & Altman‚Äôs legal tussle: Dispute over Meta 'chat' with Zuckerberg; OpenAI moves court
content: Elon Musk and Sam Altman's legal battle intensifies as Musk's lawyers attempt to block OpenAI from acquiring documents from Meta regarding an alleged $97.4 billion bid for OpenAI's assets. OpenAI claims Musk approached Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg to join the bid, which Zuckerberg declined.

title: Trump tariffs: Why Nifty50, BSE Sensex tanked in trade - Top reasons
content: Stock market today: Indian stock markets witnessed a significant downturn, with the Nifty50 closing at 24,500.90 and the BSE Sensex at 80,080.57. The decline was primarily attributed to newly imposed 50% US tariffs on Indian goods, triggering uncertainty among exporters.

title: Former tennis star Anna Kournikova got pregnant at 44, expecting fourth child
content: Anna Kournikova, 44, and Enrique Iglesias, 50, are expecting their fourth child, as reported by Hola magazine. This news follows concerns about Kournikova's health after she was seen in a wheelchair earlier this year. The couple, together since 2001 and parents to twins Lucy and Nicholas, 7, and daughter Mary, 5, continue to build their family life in Miami.

title: Apple‚Äôs ‚Äòawe dropping‚Äô event: iPhone 17 series launch on Sept 9; expected features & design
content: Apple is set to unveil its iPhone 17 series on September 9, 2025, at an ‚ÄòAwe Dropping‚Äô event. The lineup may feature four models, including a new slim 'Air' variant. Rumors suggest design changes like a lower Apple logo on Pro models and potential color options hinted at in the event invite.

title: 'Pains me to bring storm of chaos': Minneapolis shooter schedules letter to family
content: Robin Westman, the 23-year-old assailant in the Minneapolis school shooting that killed two children and injured 17, left behind a four-page letter and disturbing videos. In the letter dedicated to family and friends, Westman apologized for the pain her actions would cause, urging them to move on and even change their names. She blamed the world for her despair, citing depression, suicidal thoughts, and a possible cancer diagnosis.

title: Ukraine allows young men to leave the country: Why Kyiv is suddenly easing its wartime travel ban
content: Ukraine is easing wartime travel restrictions, allowing men aged 18-22 to travel abroad until 23, effective August 29, 2025. This reverses the blanket ban imposed in 2022. Kyiv aims to provide educational and employment opportunities, addressing demographic challenges worsened by the war.

title: How rich is Dubai Princess Sheikha Mahra? Inside the royal's net worth
content: Sheikha Mahra of Dubai, daughter of the UAE ruler, commands a personal net worth estimated between $300 million and $1.5 billion. Beyond royal inheritance, her wealth stems from her luxury brand Mahra M1, launched after a high-profile divorce. With bold business moves and a global engagement to rapper French Montana, she‚Äôs shaping a modern, independent royal identity.

title: Scientists tagged a whale with a camera; the footage left them speechless
content: Researchers captured a humpback whale's perspective of breaching using camera tags, revealing insights into their movements and behavior. The footage offers a unique view of how these giants coordinate their actions and conserve energy. This technology revolutionizes whale research, uncovering hidden aspects of feeding, resting, and social interactions, ultimately aiding conservation efforts.

title: Elliotte Friedman: Connor McDavid‚Äôs contract delay sparks tension
content: Connor McDavid's contract situation looms large as the Edmonton Oilers approach the 2025 season, with no extension signed yet. Elliotte Friedman warns that the ongoing uncertainty could become a major distraction, impacting the team's focus and Stanley Cup aspirations. McDavid emphasizes his desire to win in Edmonton, but acknowledges that all options remain open, intensifying media and fan pressure.

title: Pulwama: Thousands attend day-night cricket match - watch video
content: Pulwama, once marred by violence and the site of the tragic 2019 terror attack, is now witnessing a remarkable transformation. The district is hosting its first-ever night cricket tournament, drawing large crowds and fostering a sense of community.

title: '99% of them are dodging taxes': Arundhati Roy targets 'great nationalists'
content: Arundhati Roy, at her memoir launch, 'Mother Mary Comes to Me,' stated that those labeled 'anti-nationals' often genuinely care about the country, while self-proclaimed nationalists prioritize personal wealth. She described her memoir as a tribute to her mother, Mary Roy, a women‚Äôs rights activist. "I write when it becomes harder to keep quiet than to write," Roy told PTI.

title: Voter Adhikar Yatra: BJP says abuses hurled at PM Modi, his mother at Congress rally
content: The BJP has strongly condemned Rahul Gandhi and Tejaswi Yadav after a video surfaced from a Bihar rally allegedly showing offensive language used against PM Modi and his late mother. The BJP accused the opposition leaders of stooping to the lowest form of politics, crossing all boundaries of insult and vulgarity. The party stated that the people of Bihar would not forgive them.

title: Interfaith land deals in Assam will need police approval, says Himanta
content: Assam's cabinet has approved a new SOP requiring special branch clearance for inter-religious land transactions, citing concerns about national security and demographic shifts. This measure aims to prevent fraudulent land transfers that could incite communal tension and ensure constitutional principles are upheld. The policy also targets NGOs from outside Assam seeking land, reflecting anxieties over changing demographics and land encroachments.

title: Noida man orders sandwich online, finds plastic glove inside
content: Satish Sarawagi in Noida found a plastic glove in his sandwich. He ordered it through Zomato. The sandwich had broccoli, corn, and basil pesto. Sarawagi posted images on X. He tagged Zomato and the restaurant. He also tagged India‚Äôs food regulator. Zomato responded, expressing shock. They contacted the customer. They said they would discuss it with the restaurant.

title: Saudi Arabia: Massive sunspots spotted over Arar, astronomers explain their effects
content: Massive sunspots were spotted over Arar this week, including spots 4195, 4197, and 4199, some among the largest seen in 2025. Astronomers explained these are cooler, magnetically active regions on the Sun, often linked to solar flares and geomagnetic storms. Experts stressed their study is crucial, warning of possible communication and satellite disruptions, while encouraging public observation.

title: Watch: Arjun Tendulkar makes first public appearance since getting engaged
content: Arjun Tendulkar, 25, made his first public appearance with his family after his engagement to Saaniya Chandhok, 26, was confirmed by Sachin Tendulkar. The family was seen celebrating Ganesh Chaturthi and posed for a picture. The player's last post on Instagram came on September 9 in light of Raksha Bandhan.

title: Deion Sanders blasts critics: Defends son Shilo after NFL dream collapses
content: Shilo Sanders, son of Deion Sanders, faced a setback after being waived by the Tampa Bay Buccaneers following a preseason ejection. Despite the disappointment, Deion Sanders expressed confidence in his son's resilience and future prospects, emphasizing Shilo's diverse talents and preparedness for life beyond football. While his NFL journey faces uncertainty, options remain, including potential opportunities in the CFL.

title: 'Param Sundari' review: Netizens call Sidharth & Janhvi's film 'romcom at its best'
content: Janhvi Kapoor and Sidharth Malhotra's 'Param Sundari,' a romantic comedy directed by Tushar Jalota, is generating positive buzz ahead of its release. Early reviews from a special screening praise the film's chemistry and feel-good vibe. With 'War 2' and 'Coolie' slowing down, 'Param Sundari' has a chance to shine, relying on positive word-of-mouth for success.

title: Dubai Princess Sheikha Mahra gets engaged to rapper French Montana
content: Sheikha Mahra, a Dubai princess known for her entrepreneurial spirit and philanthropy, divorced Sheikh Mana Al Maktoum in July 2024 and launched a perfume brand, with her first fragrance named "Divorce". In June 2025, she got engaged to rapper French Montana, confirmed after sightings at events in Dubai, Paris, and Morocco. She continues to be a prominent figure in Dubai.

title: Rajasthan paper leak: Sub-inspector (SI) recruitment 2021 examination cancelled
content: The Rajasthan High Court has cancelled a recruitment examination following allegations of widespread irregularities and paper leaks. Justice Samir Jain's bench delivered the verdict after a year-long legal battle initiated by candidates claiming injustice.

title: 'We should impose 100% tariff on America': Kejriwal targets PM Modi over US tariffs
content: Arvind Kejriwal criticized Prime Minister Narendra Modi for allegedly betraying Indian farmers by removing the 11% import duty on American cotton, linking it to trade tensions with the US. He also attacked President Donald Trump for imposing tariffs on Indian goods and urged India to respond with even tougher trade measures, emphasizing the country's market strength.

title: Most-liked Instagram posts ever: Where Taylor Swift‚Äôs engagement post ranks
content: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce's engagement announcement on Instagram broke the internet on August 26, 2025. The post, featuring photos from a garden proposal, garnered millions of likes within hours, briefly crashing Instagram. Swift's Ralph Lauren dress and vintage-style ring became instant sensations. The post ranks among the top 20 most-liked ever, sparking widespread celebration and memes online.

title: WARNING! Japan issues AI video: Mount Fuji eruption risks; Tokyo residents on alert
content: Japan has released an AI-generated video simulating a Mount Fuji eruption to warn Tokyo residents about potential hazards. The simulation depicts ash plumes spreading towards the city, highlighting risks to health, transportation, and power. While no eruption is imminent, the video aims to enhance public awareness and encourage emergency preparedness in the high-risk seismic zone.

title: Chess: Abused French transgender player wins national title; creates history
content: Yosha Iglesias, a 37-year-old chess player, has made history by winning the French Women's Chess Championship, becoming the second transgender player to achieve this feat. Overcoming challenges and online harassment, Iglesias defeated Women's Grand Master Mitra Hejazipour in the final.

title: Russia visa surge: Why 1 million Indian workers are choosing Moscow
content: As the UK, US, and Canada become less accessible, Russia is emerging as a major destination for Indian workers. With a projected labour shortage of 3.1 million by 2030, Russian companies are actively hiring Indians across construction, electronics, and machinery sectors. Around 1 million Indian specialists are expected to arrive, prompting new consular facilities. The Indian embassy has also issued visa fraud warnings, as demand continues to grow and the Indian community in Russia expands steadily.

title: SCO summit: PM Modi to be in China after 7 years; Putin to also attend
content: President Xi Jinping is set to host over 20 world leaders, including Vladimir Putin and Narendra Modi, at the SCO summit in Tianjin, signaling Global South solidarity. PM Modi's visit marks a significant step towards easing tensions with China after border clashes.

title: 'People may still be trapped': Moment Russian missiles hit Kyiv neighbourhood - watch
content: Following a deadly missile and drone attack on Kyiv, which resulted in at least eight fatalities, including a child, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy has urged the global community to impose stricter sanctions on Russia. He criticized those advocating for a ceasefire and diplomacy, accusing Moscow of prioritizing aggression over dialogue.

title: Stock market: Nifty50 below 24,550; BSE Sensex drops over 700 points
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, tanked in opening trade on Thursday a day after 50% US tariffs came into effect on India. While Nifty50 was below 24,550 BSE Sensex was over 700 points down.

title: Argentina eases visa rules: Indians with US visa can enter without separate permit
content: Argentina has simplified travel for Indian nationals holding valid US tourist visas. Ambassador Mariano Caucino announced that Indians with US visas can now enter Argentina without needing a separate Argentine visa. This decision, formalized in the Official Gazette, aims to boost tourism and strengthen ties between the two nations.

title: 'Start dreaming big': Lovlina Borgohain to kids as she shares her struggle-to-success journey
content: Olympic medalist Lovlina Borgohain encouraged children in India's villages to dream big, regardless of their circumstances. Growing up near a tea garden in Assam, she overcame numerous challenges to win a bronze medal at the Tokyo Olympics. Lovlina's journey demonstrated that with belief and perseverance, anyone can achieve their dreams, inspiring countless others to pursue their aspirations.

title: Telangana floods: 1 dead, over 900 rescued, highways blocked
content: Extremely heavy rainfall lashed several districts in Telangana, leading to widespread inundation and overflowing streams. Kamareddy district received the highest rainfall, prompting large-scale rescue operations by the Indian Army, NDRF, and other authorities. Hundreds of people were evacuated, including students from residential schools, and traffic was disrupted on National Highway 44.

title: HP monsoon mayhem: Toll climbs to 310 ‚Äî 158 rain deaths, 152 in road mishaps
content: Himachal Pradesh has faced a severe monsoon season. It has led to 310 deaths since June 20. Rain-related incidents and road accidents are the major causes. Extensive damage to public and private property has occurred. Mandi is the worst-hit district. Connectivity, power, and water supply are disrupted. Authorities are working to restore essential services.

title: 'Nuke India, kill Trump': Minneapolis shooter wrote chilling messages on weapons
content: Robin Westman, 23, opened fire at Annunciation Catholic Church in Minneapolis, killing two children and injuring 17. The assailant had messages like "NUKE INDIA" and others written on the weapons. Authorities are investigating the incident as domestic terrorism and a hate crime, focusing on Westman's social media posts containing violent diary entries and the fact that Westman was a former student of the school.

title: Google Maps detour turns deadly: Car with 9 swept away in Chittorgarh river; 3 dead
content: A tragic incident occurred in Chittorgarh district. A car carrying nine relatives was swept away from a river bridge. Three relatives, including a mother and daughter, died. A six-year-old girl is missing. Five people were rescued. The family was returning from Sawai Bhoj temple. They were using Google Maps, which led them to a closed bridge.

title: Kamareddy receives second highest recorded two-day rainfall in Telangana in over a century
content: It ranks second only to 626 mm two-day rainfall recorded on September 6, 1990 in Gangaram village of Mahabubabad district

title: ‚ÄòHridayapoorvam movie review‚Äô: A light-hearted entertainer that stretches a thin plot to its limits
content: In ‚ÄòHridayapoorvam‚Äô, veteran director Sathyan Anthikad sticks to his comfort zone but manages to craft an entertainer with a wafer-thin plot thanks to consistent humour and a charming Mohanlal

title: Dinesh Patnaik appointed as India‚Äôs next High Commissioner to Canada
content: Ambassador to Spain Dinesh K Patnaik has been appointed as the next High Commissioner of India to Canada, the Ministry of External Affairs (MEA) said

title: Congress MLC withdraws from district cooperative bank polls in Belagavi
content: District in-charge Minister Satish Jarkiholi says the decision has been taken to protect the interests of farmers

title: Heavy rain in parts of Shivamogga, Chikkamagaluru; Jog Falls gains vigour
content: Youths who installed Ganesha idols face difficulties holding religious and cultural events on the day owing to downpour

title: India, Bhutan sign pact for further co-operation in agriculture, allied sectors
content: "It will serve as a framework for collaboration in various areas outlined in the MoU, including agricultural research and innovation, livestock health and production, post-harvest management, value chain development, and the exchange of knowledge, skills, and expertise"

title: AQVH internal hackathon at Siddhartha Academy evokes good response
content: Event witnessed participation of 68 teams comprising a total of 408 students from various branches of B. Tech and other disciplines

title: Bihar SIR: Over 1.95 lakh demands for inclusion, exclusion in voter list; nearly 25,000 settled
content: No national party, including the BJP and the Congress, has so far made claims and objections with four more days left for the process

title: Here are the big stories from Karnataka today
content: Welcome to the Karnataka Today newsletter, your guide from The Hindu on the major news stories to follow today. Curated and written by Nalme Nachiyar.

title: Number of school teachers crossed 1 crore for first time in 2024-25: Education Ministry report
content: According to a report, the Pupil-Teacher Ratio at the foundational, preparatory, middle and secondary levels is now reported as 10, 13, 17 and 21 respectively

title: President Droupadi Murmu to visit Chennai on September 2 and 3
content: The President will stay at Raj Bhavan, Guindy, and will leave for Tiruchi by an IAF aircraft the next day

title: Nada Habba is cultural, Chamundeshwari temple is Hindu: Pramoda Devi
content: While Ms. Wadiyar did not object to Booker Prize awardee Banu Mushtaq‚Äôs selection to inaugurate the Dasara, she firmly stated that the Chamundeshwari temple follows Hindu traditions and rituals.

title: Rajasthan High Court cancels 2021 police recruitment exam
content: Justice Sameer Jain cancelled the exam 2021, which was the bone of contention for both the BJP and the Congress governments in the State and gave a detailed verdict.

title: Kerala likely to press for continuation of GST compensation at council meet
content: In Kerala‚Äôs case, U.S. tariffs and GST proposals have dealt a double whammy, says Finance Minister K.N. Balagopal. If reforms are implemented, Kerala stands to lose at least ‚Çπ8,000 crore in its revenues, as per initial assessment

title: Telangana CM Revanth inspects Yellampally project; targets BRS on Kaleshwaram barrages
content: Describing Yellampally as the ‚Äúheart of the Godavari projects,‚Äù he said it had stood firm even against unprecedented rains and heavy inflows

title: Circulate G.O. permitting shops, restaurants to stay open 24x7 to all police stations in T.N., Madras HC directs DGP
content: Justice N. Sathish Kumar issues the direction while disposing of a writ petition filed by National Restaurant Association of India based in New Delhi

title: Vizhinjam port achieves year‚Äôs cargo target in nine months
content: Port surpasses initial projection of handling 1 million TEUs in a year. By the time the port‚Äôs commercial operations complete a year in Dec. 2025, it would handle 1.3-1.4 TEUs, says Kerala Ports Minister Vasavan

title: Won't let anyone take away people's voting right till I am alive: CM Mamata
content: You torture poor people by calling them Bangladeshis. But to me, poor people are my biggest strength. I don't believe in caste or creed, I believe in humanity, says West Bengal CM Mamata Banerjee

title: Alert sounded in Bihar following inputs suggesting three terrorists from Pakistan have entered State
content: Bihar Police headquarters has issued an alert to all district police and has also issued the names and photographs of the terrorists, belonging to the banned terror outfit Jaish-e-Mohammed

title: CPI delegation meets full bench of Election Commission, discusses SIR, model code
content: The meeting¬†was held as part of a series of interactions the poll panel is holding with political parties

title: 'Voter Adhikar Yatra' to conclude with a procession in Patna on Sep 1: Khera
content: It will not be the end, but the beginning of a new Yatra (journey) towards protecting our democracy, he said

title: All parties unanimous on 27% quota for OBC in M.P.: CM Yadav
content: Earlier, the ruling BJP and the Opposition Congress in Madhya Pradesh crossed swords on many occasions over the issue of 27% reservation for OBCs, following which the matter reached the Supreme Court where it is pending.

title: Rain gains strength in Kerala, yellow alert for 9 districts on August 29
content: Hosdurg in Kasaragod records the highest rainfall of 10 cm; State likely to receive rain for at least a couple of days

title: Three-member judicial panel submits ‚Äòvoluminous‚Äô report on Sambhal violence to U.P. CM Adityanath
content: According to some reports, the ‚Äúvoluminous‚Äù document running into nearly 450 pages highlights how the Hindu population has now been reduced to around 15-20% in Sambhal, less than half of what it used to be.

title: Five ISRO technologies transferred to private companies
content: The recent set of transfers, facilitated by IN-SPACe takes the total number of Technology Transfer Agreements (TTAs) executed with industries to 98.

title: Class VIII student suffers shoulder dislocation, after teacher pushes him at Madhurawada in Visakhapatnam
content: Relatives of Naresh staged a protest and criticised the school management for failing to check on the boy‚Äôs well-being or visit him after the injury

title: TVK State conference: Case of assault on youth by bouncers transferred to Madurai district police
content: In his complaint, Sarathkumar, who had attended the second State conference of the TVK on August 21, alleged he was pushed down from the 10-foot-high ramp by bouncers who had provided security to actor and party founder Vijay

title: NDA Vice-Presidential Candidate C.P. Radhakrishnan prays at Tirumala
content: Municipal Administration Minister Ponguru Narayana, TTD chairman B.R. Naidu, Additional Executive Officer Venkaiah Chowdary along with other board members and officials traditionally received him on his arrival at the temple complex

title: Five killed as KSRTC bus rams auto, bus waiting area at Talapady in Kerala
content: Autorickshaw driver, three women, and a 10-year-old girl killed; as per initial findings the brakes of the Karnataka State Road Transport Corporation bus failed

title: Undrallu: Andhra‚Äôs savoury rice-lentil modak for Ganesha
content: In Andhra homes, Ganesha‚Äôs prasadam takes the form of undrallu, savoury rice and lentil balls made in counts of 21

title: Green traditions shape Vinayaka Chaturthi celebrations in Visakhapatnam
content: Communities and organisers in Visakhapatnam are reimagining Vinayaka Chaturthi by blending creativity with sustainability

title: Officials sounded alert over rising flood levels in Godavari, Krishna rivers

content: A five-judge Constitution Bench of the Supreme Court, headed by Chief Justice of India B.R. Gavai is hearing on the Presidential Reference

title: Opinion: Opinion | After New Tariffs, Trust Between US And India Is Running Low
content: Despite the "doom and gloom" and memories of 1998 and 2013, ties can still be repaired if the US chooses. But this requires a deeper appreciation for India's true "redlines" on agriculture market access and a consistent approach to agriculture.

title: Nirmala Sitharaman Sought Report, Promised Help: Exporters' Body On US Tariff
content: The largest exporters' organization in the country has been asked to submit a report to the government on the possible impact of the 50 per cent tariff imposed by the US.

title: Trade To Go On, But Should Be Free From Pressure: RSS Chief Amid Tariff Row
content: Trade between nations should be free of pressure, Mohan Bhagwat - chief of the BJP's ideological mentor Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh -- said today, underscoring the need to promote indigenous goods.

title: Video: Stopped From Attacking Patient, Group Assaults Doctors At Andhra Hospital
content: A group of people attacked doctors and medical staff at the Kadiri Government Hospital in Andhra Pradesh's Sri Sathya Sai district when they were stopped from assaulting a person admitted there as well as people who had gone to see him.

title: Opinion: Opinion | As Trump Shuts US Doors, Here Are 3 Places That Can Save India's Exports
content: From Eurasia to the Gulf to ASEAN, India's survival hinges on new trade partners. This is why Trump's tariffs should be seen as a new awakening and a new beginning.

title: Efforts Underway To Resolve Tariff Discord With US: Government Sources
content: After an additional 25 per cent tariff as penalty for India's purchase of Russian oil got into effect on Wednesday, government sources have said that efforts are underway to resolve the ongoing discord between India and the US.

title: When US Almost Nuked Itself: A B-47 Jet Dropped A 3,500-Kg Nuclear Bomb
content: Nearly seven decades ago, the US had a near-nuclear disaster on its own soil. On March 11, 1958, a B-47 Stratojet bomber was flying from Georgia to the UK for training

title: Hyderabad Woman Drowns 3 Sons In Bathtub, Attempts Suicide In Saudi Arabia
content: A woman from Hyderabad allegedly killed her three children before attempting to take her own life in Saudi Arabia's Al Khobar city on Tuesday.

title: Who Is Valentina Gomez, US Republican Candidate Who Burnt The Quran
content: Valentina Gomez, a Republican candidate vying for Texas' 31st Congressional District, has drawn widespread condemnation after posting a video in which she burned a copy of the Quran using a flamethrower.

title: How A Farmer From UP Lived As A 'Dead Man' For 18 Years
content: On July 30, 1976, Lal Bihari "died" in government records. He didn't know this until he applied for a bank loan to start a handloom business.

content: Karl Muller was a German who slipped into Britain in January 1915, posing as a Russian shipping broker.

title: Catch up on NFL cuts, trades and final roster moves
content:
C.J. Stroud joins "First Take" to discuss how the Texans' offensive line has improved as a unit to protect him better in the 2025 NFL season. (1:13) The roster  cut-down deadline  for all  32 teams  for the  2025 NFL season  has passed. Each front office had to trim its active roster to 53 players by 4 p.m. ET, which means there were plenty of cuts, trades, practice squad additions and  roster moves  announced. Good news: We tracked it all for you. Here is the intel, including notable moves and what our reporters heard. There will be no more updates. Quick links: 
 Team-by-team list of cuts 
 Depth charts  |  Trade tracker  |  Trade grades 
 Fantasy football draft guide  |  Sign up to play

title: How Kelce has prepared for what could be his final season
content: the Chiefs star tight end is in the final year of his contract . he has spoken about his future with the team through only this season . "i can't go out like that," he says . the chiefs start their season in so Paulo next week .

title: The Playoff Playbook: Tips to help you win your fantasy baseball league
content: the fantasy baseball playoffs begin on Monday in the rotisserie leagues . it's formally make-or-break, win or go-home time, where the stakes are heightened each and every day . you're not in much different circumstances, with a mad, four-week dash to the finish line ahead .

title: Contenders and bottom five: Expert predictions for NBA East and West standings
content: in a competitive Western Conference, standings don't seem as set in stone . last season, seeding for the playoffs wasn't settled until the last day of the regular season . this season, after some major moves, most notably Kevin Durant to the Houston Rockets, expect to see another tense standings race .

title: Travis Kelce unveils American Eagle collection with Azzi Fudd and more star athletes

title: East Carolina-NC State and other under-the-radar rivalries really pack a punch
